name: Secret Ties
summary: Secret Ties, an unreleased game for the Nintendo Entertainment System, is an English translation of Master Thief Sugar, an equally-unreleased game for the Nintendo Family Computer. The game was developed by Vic Tokai, of Golgo 13 videogame fame, and is based on an early 1970s comic book by Takao Saito, of Golgo 13 comic book fame.
